TopicTitle: the object or vessel selected sets on fire. never goes out. will set new object on fire if i switch to something else, does no damage.

Articles.Content:
hello, please see the link below for all info and pictures on my suspected glitch.

http://imgur.com/a/CtTci

 

version 1.2.2.1.1622. 64 bit. never crashes.

Hope someone can help!

Thanks!
Could you please provide the appropriate log files?
Check you Real Plume, Real Fuels and SmokeScreen installs. A list of all your mods, and your logs would indeed be helpful too.
Hello All. Thank you all for your help. i painfully removed and installed mods until i singled out the bad egg... the problem... hotrockets mod. be careful with this. thank you all.
